snippet: Polina Edmunds, 15, finished second over all at the U.S. figure skating championships, but that does not guarantee she will be named to the American team for the Sochi Olympics.
abstract: Polina Edmunds, finishes second over all at the United States figure skating championships, but that does not guarantee she will be named to the American team for the Sochi Olympics; in figure skating, a competitor’s body of work over an extended period, including world championships and international Grand Prix events, are also considered.
lead_paragraph: Polina Edmunds, 15, finished second over all at the U.S. figure skating championships, but that does not guarantee she will be named to the American team for the Sochi Olympics.

headline.main: U.S. Figure Skating Team Awaits Difficult Winnowing
headline.print_headline: U.S. Figure Skating Team Awaits Difficult Winnowing
